name: Cole S. Grundstedt
summary: Director / Vice President of Operations, Engineering, and Supply Chain with 12 years in manufacturing, operations, engineering, GSC, NPI/NPD, project management, ERP systems, configuration management, data analytics, and business intelligence. Experienced in capital goods manufacturing, gaming, and technology; skilled in lean factory, mixed-model and cellular production, data-driven KPIs, and culture turnaround leading to improved team performance and on-time product launches.

experience.title: Director of Engineering
experience.description: Capital goods manufacturer, software developer for hospitality & gaming, $1b sales, 3k employees. Major customers: Las Vegas Sands, MGM Resorts, Caesars Entertainment, Wynn Resorts, Boyd Gaming.

experience.title: Director of Manufacturing Engineering (Operations Engineering)
experience.description: Directed all product launches, training, system controls, capital equipment, and product compliance. Administered strategic planning and management of department P&L, OPEX $5m and CAPEX $2m.

experience.title: Senior Manager of Enterprise Resource Planning (Configuration Management)
experience.description: Configuration Management expansion tripled product line support, managing ERP controls for 1,000,000 SKUs, 25k product orders and 50k service orders per year. Led 6 direct reports.

experience.title: Manager of New Product (Project Management & NPI/NPD)
experience.description: Oversaw project managers liaising with engineering, operations, and service departments; timely launch of new product; accelerated NPI time-to-market by 70%; implemented data distribution and training.

experience.title: Senior New Product Engineer, Manufacturing Engineer, and Project Manager
experience.description: Supplier quality defects driven to a 4-year low; created supplier scorecard; managed customized product for 3 corporate accounts earning $15m in sales. Production capacity increased 33% by launching cellular production method.

experience.title: Performance Assessment Intern
experience.description: Data Center Network Engineer responsibilities: built & maintained 50 servers, 10 RAID5 disk arrays & three 20kVA UPS stacks; developed PM schedule resulting in reduced downtime.

Bachelor of Science in Industrial and Systems Engineering
